title: NOW Solutions Castor Oil, 100 % Pure, 16 ounce
description: Condition:  In need of an all-natural emollient.  Solution:  100% Pure Castor Oil is expeller-pressed from the seed of Ricinus communisand is virtually odorless and tasteless.  While it's applicable in many other areas of wellness, Castor Oil is considered by many to be one of the finest natural skin emollients available today.  Also known as Palma Christi (the "Palm of Christ"), castor oil celebrates a history of use that dates back to biblical times.  Since then, it has been used therapeutically to help support and soften healthy skin and hair, and is commonly used in some of today's most popular cosmetic and beauty formulas.  NOW® Solutions is the next step in the evolution of personal care products.  This comprehensive natural line encompasses anti-aging moisturizers and serums, bath and body gels, shampoos and conditioners, oral care, skin care, and essential oils. all of which are formulated with the finest functional ingredients from around the world.  NOW® Solutions products avoid harsh chemicals and synthetic ingredients in all of our formulations, to provide a more natural product line.

title: DHC Deep Cleansing Oil 6.7 fl. oz/200 ml
description: Superstar. Try this amazing cleanser and youll see why its our most popular product worldwide. Dirt, excess oil, makeup even waterproof mascara and other pore-cloggers dissolve easily, leaving your face a grime-free zone that is soft to the touch. Its unique water-soluble formula rinses completely, so youll never see a greasy residue. Olive oil and vitamin E help ensure you wont see dryness either.

title: Ojoba Collective Raw, Unrefined Shea Butter: Fresh & Creamy - Naturally Nourishing Skin Cream 100% Fair Trade from Ghana (4 oz/113g) Unscented
description:
Our Raw Shea Butter is pure, unrefined, unscented & Fair Trade! Made in Ghana, Africa by the Ojoba Women's Shea Cooperative, this is one of the freshest butters out there! Safe for all skin types and great for natural hair.
Shea butter's made from kernels of wild African shea trees. All of our shea butter is made from wild-crafted kernels collected in a remote region where no pesticides or herbicides are used.
No chemicals are used to process our shea butter. It is traditionally hand-crafted by our women's cooperative, using the same method as their grandmothers.
Studies have shown that raw shea butter is naturally high in antioxidants, essential fatty acids, lupeol, unsaponifiables, and cinnamic acid; all of which work to protect, heal and rejuvenate the skin and hair.
Many shea butters products are chemically refined or diluted with inferior ingredients. All of this deprives the shea butter of its intrinsic healing properties. At Ojoba Collective we only offer fresh, raw, unscented shea butter. Nothing's added and nothing's taken away.
Please note: Raw shea butter has a natural, nutty scent. It is not an added fragrance, and will dissipate as it absorbs into your skin.
Since we don't process our raw shea butter in anyway, you'll notice slight inconsistencies in texture.  Simply scoop out a small amount of our raw shea butter and rub it between your hands to melt it, and apply as needed.
Ojoba Collective is a member of Fair Trade Federation, Natural Products Association & a Gold-Certified member of Green America. The shea butter is regularly lab-tested to ensure quality, is vegan-friendly and never tested on animals!
Our fair trade shea butter supports the Ojoba Women's Shea Butter Cooperative; empowering them and their community.  Benefits include access to education, health care, training in organic farming, and much more.
Our Shea Butter is an eco-friendly, socially conscious, healthy alternative to chemical-laden beauty products.

title: Poshe Super-Fast Drying Top Coat
description: Poshe Super-Fast Drying Nail Top Coat is a new generation topcoat! Dries manicure completely in 5 to 6 Minutes. Enhances nail color for looks that are on the go.
